name: Loop Industries, Inc.
description: Loop Industries, Inc. is a technology company dedicated to accelerating the world's shift to sustainable plastic. Founded in 2010, Loop has developed a groundbreaking process to depolymerize waste polyethylene terephthalate (PET) plastic and polyester fiber into its base building blocks. This innovative technology allows Loop to create high-purity, biodegradable PET resin from 100% recycled materials, thus reducing reliance on fossil fuels and minimizing plastic waste in landfills and oceans. The company's mission is to contribute to a circular economy by enabling brands and manufacturers to produce sustainable products without compromising quality or performance. Loop Industries partners with various corporations across the globe, providing them with sustainable PET solutions that meet growing consumer demand for eco-friendly products. As part of its commitment to sustainability, Loop also invests in research and development to enhance its technology and expand its production capabilities. With a focus on environmentally responsible manufacturing, Loop Industries is poised to lead the way in transforming the plastic industry and promoting a more sustainable future.

faq.question: What does Loop Industries do?
faq.answer: Loop Industries develops technology to recycle PET plastic and polyester fiber into high-purity, sustainable resin.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of Loop Industries?
faq.answer: Daniel Solomita is the CEO of Loop Industries, Inc.

faq.question: Where is Loop Industries headquartered?
faq.answer: Loop Industries is headquartered in Montreal, Quebec, Canada.

faq.question: What are Loop Industries' main products?
faq.answer: Loop Industries' main product is sustainable Loop PET resin.
